lead_paragraph: State lawmakers rejected Gov. Terry McAuliffe’s plan that would allow people who are protected by a protective order to carry a hidden handgun without getting a permit.

headline.print_headline: Virginia: Governor’s Changes to Gun Bill Rejected
headline.main: Virginia: Governor’s Changes to Handgun Bill Are Rejected

snippet: State lawmakers rejected Gov. Terry McAuliffe’s plan that would allow people who are protected by a protective order to carry a hidden handgun without getting a permit.
abstract: Bipartisan group of Virginia lawmakers reject Gov Terry McAuliffe's amendments to bill that would allow residents protected by protective order to carry concealed firearm without getting permit.
